name: Shop 'n Stones
description:
Just click and drag to match gems and special items!

Try reaching league 1, if you dare...

!! Disclaimer !!
if you can, use the downloadable version. On web browsers, the league level is hidden behind the Jam Submission Page button, and is pretty hard to see. This problem is not present when the game is downloaded. Have fun!

The game is made for BTP jam, made in about 4 days of work. 

-- Credits --

Programming, Game Design, Art by PirhanaLab
Music and SFX by JessicaRobo
